description: Attach and detach interface and external events are not supported when using cells. These are needed when using neutron.
title: Cells: attach/detach interface and external events not supported

comments.content: Attach and detach interface are not supported when using cells
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sorrison

comments.content:
Change abandoned by Andrew Laski (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/184155
Reason: Yep.  The consensus was that cellsv1 work, including getting a cells+neutron job running, is taking momentum from v2.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Change abandoned by Matt Riedemann (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/215459
Reason: I think we agreed in a nova meeting awhile ago that we're no longer adding feature support to cells v1, it's also in the devref now:

http://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova/cells.html#status
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: With cells v2 we aren't adding API feature parity for cells v1 so marking this as won't fix.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem
